snippet: The director Sheldon Candis recalled his Baltimore boyhood to create the script for his first film, “Luv.”
abstract: Excerpts from conversation with director Sheldon Candis, who describes how he drew from his Baltimore boyhood to create the script for his first film, Luv.
lead_paragraph: The director Sheldon Candis recalled his Baltimore boyhood to create the script for his first film, “Luv.”

headline.seo: Sheldon Candis Directs His First Film, ‘Luv’
headline.main: Just Cry Uncle: Write, and Direct, What You Know
